channel.title: Combat-x ll World switching ll rock-tail Fishing ll Removed
channel.description:
I got bored and started Rsps again so i hope you like this.
THIS IS A DEATHLYPVPV4 SOURCE!!! DON'T CRY GIRLS!
[center][img]http://nimga.com/m/AjBYS.gif[/img]
[url=http://www.google.co.uk]Removed[/url]
- Nex, Corp, Jad, Nomad, bork, avatar and loads more! - Fullscreen With NO LAG - Bank Pins - Bank Searching - Squeal Of Fortune - Duel Arena - Fully equipped Voteshop - Decent and fun economy. - 24.7 Uptime - Vote4Cash / just a basic vote system - Trading - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - 5 Levels of Donator status - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - All Spirit shields working, Even their affects. - Working Teleblock - Yell with custom tags - Barrows - shops good pricings / still being updated
New updates from 14/7/13
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a69gOXD.png[/img] - Bork ::bork - Avatar of Destruction ::des - Updated Drops - Fixed weapon's hits - Combat styles
New updates from 07/8/13
- New spawn stop flooders - New world spawn - Custum starter - Vote shop Updated - donator ranks - donator titles - Expiriment - All caves updated - Rocktail Fishing - Construction 100%
New updates from 08/8/13 - World switching - World ports + ip
World 1 port 43594 - Eco
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bWZazi9.png[/img]
World 2 Port 5555 - Spawn 98% spawn everyone can spawn including some god-swords all rares ex.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YloJqNA.png[/img]
Currency in World 2
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uYkhypc.png[/img]
Custom Donator ranks
Devil Donator
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6PWSfIj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ACPbHNU.png[/img]
Soul Donator
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qcvXsAP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fnrPTfs.png[/img]
Super donator
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qJK8V73.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Hide n seek if you win you get a reward and get to pick what NPC and the Teleport name such as ::des was picked by "Beastlol" and it teleports you to his custom place to kill Avatar.
Bork was Decided by another player "andrew" In his custom place[/size]
[size=10pt]If you want something added we will tell you if we can do it or not and if we can it will be added straight away, On this server we listen to you! [/size]
[size=15pt]Home[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/awv9ABo.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Penguin[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jhQktRf.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Experiments!![/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J1kO6VN.png[/img]
[size=15pt]Yaks[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vQ67VVx.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Rocktail Fishing!![/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tksa07M.png[/img]
[center][size=18pt]World 2[/size]
[size=14pt]World 2 is a world where its all about spawning and killing, we have made it 98% spawn-able you can spawn all rare's but you can't spawn any items in the pk shop. Such as fire cape, ags, void, Vesta ex.[/size]
[size=14pt]We had to think every server you see out there uses the same currency like tokil, guthix tokens ex, so we decided to use a unique token "Dragon token" soon we will be adding a shop where only certain items can be brought that aren't spawn-able. [/size]
Dragon claws [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qGKpRVy.jpg[/img]
Chaotic maul [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9WhDeTh.jpg[/img]
Armadyl Godsword [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jxZOgv6.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Can you get it this popular?
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5XE8Q9T.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Combat-x ll World switching ll rock-tail Fishing ll Removed
item.dc:creator: @Teem_Rocket Teem_Rocket
item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

Combatx:

i didn’t know you girls where were going to cry

It’s our party and we’ll cry if we want to.

On-Topic: At least you took the effort of following Tutorials for those updates (or writing them yourself; either way). If this is your first release, you should keep going and be sure to keep including a Developmental Log to track progress and show what has been done – just like you posted in your last response.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Combatx Combatx
item.description:
@Combatx wrote:

i was trying to add to this community i didn’t know you girls where going to cry, ill remove I’ve fixed loads of bugs added loads of NPs fixed up client and so much more.

  • Bork ::bork
  • Avatar of Destruction ::des
  • Updated Drops
  • Fixed weapon’s hits
  • Combat styles

New updates from 07/8/13

  • New spawn stop flooders
  • New world spawn
  • Custum starter
  • Vote shop Updated
  • donator ranks
  • donator titles
  • Expiriment
  • All caves updated
  • Rocktail Fishing
  • Construction 100%

New updates from 08/8/13

  • World switching
  • World ports + ip

At least i’m adding to the community…

Read full topic

item.title: Combat-x ll World switching ll rock-tail Fishing ll Removed
item.dc:creator: @Not_Botting Not Botting
item.description:
@Not_Botting wrote:

[quote=“manteliakas, post:6, topic:527737”][quote author=Combatx link=topic=646488.msg4347706#msg4347706 date=1376150715]
tried changing worlds to combat-x w1? and run the right source? there is two not the one with new folder the other one.
[/quote]
i tryed opened the all sources, and yes there is a 2 source folders with the compiles. and i opened the ALL Compiles and ALL “Run”. i cheked the all folders all sources and i get the same error blalalal “Error connect to server” . :([/quote]

Change the ip in the client.java file… save + compile… done… easy shit dude…

Read full topic

@Combatx wrote:

I got bored and started Rsps again so i hope you like this.

THIS IS A DEATHLYPVPV4 SOURCE!!! DON’T CRY GIRLS!

[center]

Removed

  • Nex, Corp, Jad, Nomad, bork, avatar and loads more!
  • Fullscreen With NO LAG
  • Bank Pins

  • Squeal Of Fortune

World 2 Port 5555 - Spawn 98% spawn everyone can spawn including some god-swords all rares ex.

[size=10pt]Hide n seek if you win you get a reward and get to pick what NPC and the Teleport name such as ::des was picked by “Beastlol” and it teleports you to his custom place to kill Avatar.

Bork was Decided by another player “andrew” In his custom place[/size]

[size=10pt]If you want something added we will tell you if we can do it or not and if we can it will be added straight away, On this server we listen to you!

[size=14pt]World 2 is a world where its all about spawning and killing, we have made it 98% spawn-able you can spawn all rare’s but you can’t spawn any items in the pk shop.
Such as fire cape, ags, void, Vesta ex.[/size]

[size=14pt]We had to think every server you see out there uses the same currency like tokil, guthix tokens ex, so we decided to use a unique token “Dragon token” soon we will be adding a shop where only certain items can be brought that aren’t spawn-able. [/size]
